data.actual_result: Username/discriminator gets off screen and you need to rotate to Landscape to see them
data.expected_result: The nickname should cut off early to make place for the real username/discriminator
data.short_description: Long nicknames push away the real name/discriminator in from: search filter suggestions
data.steps_to_repro: - Set youself a very long nickname - Go to Search and select the from: filter - Start typing out your nickname (not your username)  - Observe the suggestions in both portrait and landscape orientation
